document_data.name: Shikomi-zue
document_data.mainbody: A '''shikomi-zue''' ({{Pronounce|shee|koh|mee|zoo|eh|refs=}}) was a weapon used in [[Kara-Tur]], primarily by [[ninja]]s and [[sohei]].
document_data.Description: At first glance, a shikomi-zue appeared as a regular staff. However, a spring-loaded spear head was hidden within. The spear head sprung forth by either pressing a button or twisting the shaft. Other weapons could be concealed with the staff such as chains or hooks. A shikomi-zue was made from either [[bamboo]] or wood and was about {{SI|6|ft}} in length. Assembling the weapon took about a week.
